filesprocessing.filters

Class FilterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesprocessing.filters.FilterFactory

  • public class FilterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    a class factory that creates filter object according to the commendfile

      • getFilter

        public static Filter getFilter(java.lang.String line,
                               int lineNumber)
                        throws ErrorTypeOne
        a function that splits the given string line to an array returns a filter object calling other functions the creates an check for validation of the line given
        Parameters:
        line - string line - commend from commend file
        lineNumber - lineNumber of line in commend file
        Returns:
        filter object
        Throws:
        ErrorTypeOne - Exception dealing with bad line commend format from the commendfile

        filter object

                                     int minLength,

                              throws ErrorTypeOne

        Parameters:
        commendOfFilter - array of strings commend
        minLength - min length of commendOfFilter
        maxLength - max length of commendOfFilter
        Returns:

        ErrorTypeOne
